ygData.subject: Re: [eqbards] Song of Twilight stackability
ygData.msgSnippet: ... It completely blocks it. :(  Someone mentioned it might get fixed soon. Let s hope so. ... Almost daily and we have to deal with this more often than I
ygData.messageBody:
>I was trying to experiment with Song of Twilight stacking with enchanter
>mez. Does anyone know how they work together. Our thoughts (I was with my
>new guild's big enchanter killing imps and discussing this. She had to log
>before we got to test it) were if I could lay down a SoT or 2 until the
>chanters got the mobs locked down, it would be a huge boon for raids.
>
>Does SoT block any/all enchanter mez?
>Does it overwrite?

It completely blocks it. :( Someone mentioned it might get fixed soon.
Let's hope so.


>
>I will try to test this on my own, but how often do you have a lvl 60
>enchanter at your disposal?
>

Almost daily and we have to deal with this more often than I like, but many
times it has kept him from getting killed. =)


>Elfson Allego <The CIrcle of Eternity>
>53 Veeshan
>^^^ Hoping to get to 54 before Bard BOTB so he layeth the smack down on
>Sartori
>

DOH.... Them's fightin words. Don't worry, I will be practicing lots with
Crip and Creediki in the Arena as soon as they announce it. Crip's the one
that worries me. :)
